--- Testing vblendvps (variable blend packed single-precision floats) ---
--- Basic Test ---
Expected: 1.100000 10.100000 3.300000 12.120000 5.500000 14.140000 7.700000 16.160000 
Result: 1.100000 10.100000 3.300000 12.120000 5.500000 14.140000 7.700000 16.160000 

--- Boundary Test ---
Expected: 0.000000 -inf -inf 0.000000 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 2.000000 
Result: 0.000000 -inf -inf 0.000000 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 2.000000 

vblendvps all tests passed
